title: At War!
description: The effect of World War I on the University of Idaho, 100 years after the war, is explored in a new Special Collections and Archives exhibit on the second floor of the U of I Library. Through newspaper clippings, scrapbook pages, photos and other memorabilia, the At War! display provides a glimpse of the Great War's impact on the university community. The exhibit will be on display through Dec. 7.

title: Here's to the Band
description: Here's to the Band, an exhibit highlighting Lionel Hampton and his band, will be on display January 14th through March 11th 2019 in honor of the Lionel Hampton Jazz Festival. From Hampton playing in the Benny Goodman Quartet, to forming the Lionel Hampton Orchestra, to performing at the Lionel Hampton Jazz Festival, this exhibit shows how Lionel and his band created a unique jazz legacy.
